trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static predefined text decorations.
There are four types of text decorations: baseline, overline, strikethrough, and underline.
The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text.
![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations")
Example of text decoration types
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values

The type of text decoration: <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations.Baseline%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations.OverLine%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations.Strikethrough%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations.Underline%2A>.
More than one decoration is permitted, with values separated by commas.
You can also specify "None" to indicate no type of text decoration.
Specifies a baseline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
The following example shows the location of a baseline text decoration relative to the text.
![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations")
Example of a baseline text decoration
A value that represents a baseline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
Specifies an overline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
The following example shows the location of an overline text decoration relative to the text.
![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations")
Example of an overline text decoration
A value that represents an overline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
Specifies a strikethrough <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
The following example shows the location of a strikethrough text decoration relative to the text.
![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations")
Example of a strikethrough text decoration
A value that represents a strikethrough <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
Specifies an underline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
The following example shows the location of an underline text decoration relative to the text.
![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations")
Example of an underline text decoration
By default, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> uses a <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration> object to display an underline.
For more information, see [How to: Specify Whether a Hyperlink is Underlined](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-specify-whether-a-hyperlink-is-underlined.md).
A value that represents an underline <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>.
